title: Ukraine’s Donbas Strategy: Retreat Slowly and Maximize Russian Losses
content: The idea is to use rope-a-dope tactics, letting Russian forces pound away until they have exhausted themselves. It’s far from clear if the Ukrainian strategy will succeed.
summary: The idea is to use rope-a-dope tactics, letting Russian forces pound away until they have exhausted themselves. It’s far from clear if the Ukrainian strategy will succeed.

title: A Menace to Motorists, but the ‘Noble’ Moose Is Adopted by Newfoundland
